db:info.db:title: Qt Quick Timeline
db:info.db:edition: Qt Quick Timeline | Commercial or GPLv3

db:abstract.db:para: Provides QML types to use timelines and keyframes to animate Qt Quick user interfaces.

db:article.db:para: The Qt Quick Timeline module enables keyframe-based animations and parameterization. This module is directly supported by Qt Design Studio and Qt Quick Designer, with a timeline editor to create keyframe-based animations.

db:section.db:title: Using the Module
db:section.db:para: The QML types of the module are available through the QtQuick.Timeline import. To use the types, add the following import statement to your .qml file:

db:section.db:title: Module Evolution
db:section.db:para: Changes to Qt Quick Timeline lists important changes in the module API and functionality that were done for the Qt 6 series of Qt.

db:section.db:title: Licenses
db:section.db:para: Qt Quick Timeline is available under commercial licenses from The Qt Company. In addition, it is available under the GNU General Public License, version 3. See Qt Licensing for further details.
